data.name: Black Cat
data.description: A master thief with nine lives and uncanny luck, Felicia Hardy's sticky fingers nab enemy buffs and distribute Charge to her allies.

starItems.name: Black Cat
starItems.description: A master thief with nine lives and uncanny luck, Felicia Hardy's sticky fingers nab enemy buffs and distribute Charge to her allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar on the primary target by <color=#86e619>5%</color>
Fill Speed Bar on this character by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Reduce Speed Bar on the primary target by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
Fill Speed Bar on this character by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Reduce Speed Bar on the primary target by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
Fill Speed Bar on this character by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

item.name: Black Cat's Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Reduce Speed Bar on the primary target by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
Fill Speed Bar on this character by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>30%</color> or less Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>ARENA OFFENSE</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + copy and clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing and do the following effects to the primary target:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
 > Copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
 > Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on each target.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target
Copy and clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing and do the following effects to the primary target:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
 > Copy and clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
 > Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on each target.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for the primary target
Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for this character

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing and do the following effects to the primary target:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
 > Copy and clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
 > Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on each target.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for this character.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing and do the following effects to the primary target:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
 > Copy and clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
 > Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on each target.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for this character.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing and do the following effects to the primary target:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
 > Copy and clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
 > Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on each target.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for this character.
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

item.name: Black Cat's Ultimate Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Do the following actions to the primary target:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > Transfer all negative effects and <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self.
 > Copy and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to self.
 > In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
 > Attack for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing.
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Do the following actions to this character:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, if primary target has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>ARENA OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemy.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#86e619>9</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from all enemies. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.

Spider-Man allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health
1.nextUpgrade:
On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects from this character
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Spider-Man allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn:

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Clear all negative effects from this character + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

For each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus, and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance

 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
For each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus, and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and Spider-Man allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>ARENA OFFENSE</color>, enemies cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>
On <color=#fff568>ARENA OFFENSE</color>, Lower Damage Reduction for all enemies that do not have <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> by <color=#86e619>15%</color>

item.name: Black Cat's Passive Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

6.description:
At the start of any match, <color=#fff568>BIO</color> enemies cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#86e619>9</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from all enemies. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Clear all negative effects from this character + heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, and lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
For each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus, and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and Spider-Man allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>ARENA OFFENSE</color>:
 > Enemies cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
 > Lower Damage Reduction for all enemies that do not have <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
